subject: Football
lead_paragraph: DeBartolo, the former owner of the San Francisco 49ers, built one of the N.F.L.’s greatest dynasties. But his legal troubles aren’t helping his chances for the Pro Football Hall of Fame.
snippet: DeBartolo, the former owner of the San Francisco 49ers, built one of the N.F.L.’s greatest dynasties. But his legal troubles aren’t helping his chances for the Pro Football Hall of Fame.
